data.name: MaximumEmailLength
data.value: The 'email' must have a maximum of 64 characters.

data.name: MinimumEmailLength
data.value: The 'email' must have a minimum of 8 characters.

data.name: MaximumPasswordLength
data.value: The 'password' must have a maximum of 64 characters.

data.name: MinimumPasswordLength
data.value: The 'password' must have a minimum of 8 characters.

data.name: StrongPassword
data.value: The 'password' must have at least: one capital letter and one number.

data.name: MaximumAvatarUrlLength
data.value: The 'avatar url' must have a maximum of 512 characters.

data.name: MaximumDescriptionLength
data.value: The 'description' must have a maximum of 1024 characters.

data.name: MaximumFullNameLength
data.value: The 'full name' must have a maximum of 128 characters.

data.name: MaximumNameLength
data.value: The 'name' must have a maximum of 64 characters.

data.name: MaximumPositionLength
data.value: The 'position' must have a maximum of 64 characters.

data.name: MaximumSpotifyAccountNameLength
data.value: The 'Spotify account name' must have a maximum of 64 characters.
